menu.name: Nostalgic Funkin
menu.desc: The ones who ported the mods.(includes scripts' credits)

credit.name: NULL
credit.desc: • Started the idea, ported Vs Whitty and Vs Carol. • Minor porting help with Vs Tabi.

credit.name: Tsaku
credit.desc: • Ported Vs Kapi, foolhardy mod stage files and raw characters files. • Minor porting help with foolhardy re-port. Ported Vs AGOTI.

credit.desc: • Ported Vs Tabi entirely, Re-ported like 80% of foolhardy. • recharted Genocide, minor porting help on Vs Kapi and Vs Whitty.
